thread.title: Great hotel with excellent breakfast
thread.title_full: Great hotel with excellent breakfast - Review of Hampton Inn San Francisco-Airport, South San Francisco, CA - TripAdvisor

author: Redding75
title: Great hotel with excellent breakfast
text: This hotel is close to the airport, like so many of them, but this hotel is very clean, roomy, has absolutely great beds, and a fabulous breakfast to start your day right. The service is good as well. You can print your boarding passes at the business center, and work out in the fitness center. For the money you pay, you definitely have a very positive experience, much better than at some of the cheap hotels.
